com.oracle.sfp.scripting.api

Interface IFundScopeAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IScriptingObject

    public interface IFundScopeAPI
extends IScriptingObject
    Gathers all the scope details of the script being evaluated (acyNo, fundCode, fundType, awy, lpNo, ppNo) allowing quick access to financialPlan/disbursements/etc subsets directly pertaining to this scope (see IFundNavigableAPI.getInScope(com.oracle.sfp.scripting.api.IFundScopeAPI)).

      String getFundType() 
      int getLpNo() 
      int getPpNo()
